description: Nishimura Satoru is a classmate of Natsume, and best friend to Kitamoto Atsushi. He is funny and easy-going, with a slightly perverted side. Although Natsume initially rejects Satoru`s overtures of friendship because of his fears of his ability being found out, he eventually becomes friends with Satoru and Atsushi, although they still hang around more with each other than Natsume.
name: Nishimura Satoru
